column4: Hi, Linux noob here - just installed Xubuntu on an old P3 machine. I added an Adaptec 1205SA PCI SATA card so I can add a SATA HDD.  How do I get Xubuntu to recognize this card so I can use the SATA drive? tyty
after reboot you dont see if you run a lspci
thanks, how is this done? real noober here
